import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import products from '../reducers/products'; function ProdcutTable() { var productIndex = 0; const products = useSelector((state) => state.products); let proRow = products.map((pro) => { var rowColor; if (productIndex++ % 2 == 0) { rowColor = "dark:bg-stone-700"; } else { rowColor = "dark:bg-stone-600"; } return ( Name Manufacturer Style Purchase Price Sale Price Quantity Commision Percent
); }); return (
{proRow}
Name Manufacturer Style Purchase Price Purchase Price Sale Price Quantity Commision Percent
); } export default ProdcutTable;
